org.sd.util.thread
Interface Governable

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseGovernable, CombinedMapReduce, DirWalker, Mapper, MapReduceBase, Reducer, RepeatingReducer, SimpleMapReduce
public interface Governable
extends java.lang.Runnable

Interface for a governable runnable.

The idea here is that if we can divide a long running operation into units, we can instrument our code such that the overall process can be monitored and manipulated between units.

Implementations of this interface keep the unit counter up-to-date with progress through the units.

Manipulation will typically be performed by passing instances to a GovernableThread to allow that manipulation.

Author:
Spence Koehler

          Get this instance's UnitCounter for progress and flow control communications.

Method Detail

getUnitCounter

UnitCounter getUnitCounter()
Get this instance's UnitCounter for progress and flow control communications.

Returns:
a non-null unit counter instance that is updated and monitored within this class's run method (directly or indirectly).
